Package org.kuali.kfs.sys.document.authorization

Interface Summary
AccountingLineAuthorizer Methods used to determine certain permissions associated with an accounting line.
FinancialSystemTransactionalDocumentPresentationController The methods needed to answer questions about presentation viewing based on internal document state for FinancialSystemTransactionalDocuments
